description: This dashboard shows information about the Ceph cluster operations.  In addition to the Ceph plugin, the Ceph mgr python plugin influx is also required to display the majority of the graphs shown in the snapshot.

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "ceph_daemon_stats" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'op_w') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "$rp"."ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Cluster.numOsd' AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Osd.opLatency' AND "instance" = 'ceph-osd.3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Osd.opLatency' AND "instance" = 'ceph-osd.3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Osd.opLatency' AND "instance" = 'ceph-osd.3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Osd.opLatency' AND "instance" = 'ceph-osd.3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" <> 'Mds.inodeMax' AND "type_instance" =~ /Mds.inode.*/ AND "instance" =~ /$cluster/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "ceph_value" WHERE "type_instance" <> 'Mds.inodeMax' AND "type_instance" =~ /Mds.inode.*/ AND "instance" =~ /$cluster/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)

list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ceph_value WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE instance =~ /.*-mon.*/

title: Ceph Cluster Operations
